arcade.potts.env.location

Class PottsLocationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.env.location.PottsLocationFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PottsLocationFactory2D, PottsLocationFactory3D

    public abstract class PottsLocationFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocationFactory
    Implementation of LocationFactory for PottsLocation objects.

    For a given Series, the factory uses its associated random number generator for shuffling voxel lists. The voxel lists a PottsLocationContainer are combined with a PottsCellContainer to instantiate a PottsLocation object.

      • createLocations

        public void createLocations(Series series)
        Creates location containers from population settings.

        The potts layer is subdivided into a grid of voxel sets. Each of these sets is used to create a location container. Note that these sets contain more voxels than required for instantiating a location; voxels are selected from the center outward until the required number of voxels (defined by a cell container) is selected. Containers are assigned regions if they exist.

        Specified by:
        createLocations in interface LocationFactory
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series

      • getVoxelsPerHeight

        int getVoxelsPerHeight(Series series)
        Finds the maximum height range between centers based on critical height. The height range is at least one and at most equal to the height of the simulation series with two voxel padding.
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        Returns:
        the voxel height range

      • getVoxelsPerSide

        int getVoxelsPerSide(Series series,
                     int heightRange)
        Finds the maximum side range between centers based on critical volume. The side range may be zero if no cells can fit in the given simulation series and includes a two voxel padding.
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        heightRange - the voxel height range
        Returns:
        the voxel sides range

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Series series,
                       ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Initializes the factory for the given series.

        For series with no loader, a list of available centers is created based on population settings. For series with a loader, the specified file is loaded into the factory.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface LocationFactory
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        random - the random number generator

      • loadLocations

        public void loadLocations(Series series)
        Loads location containers into the factory container.

        Loaded locations are mapped by their id.

        Specified by:
        loadLocations in interface LocationFactory
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
